## White Noise Counts
  
For completeness a chart for white noise - typically these events occur when the cameras turn on so, one or two per day per camera.


```{r echo = FALSE, out.width='100%'}

library(knitr)
File_In <<- (paste(params$Data_Folder,params$Rpt_Month," ",params$Rpt_Year,"/","Chart_Category_Bar_",params$Rpt_Year,"_YTD__White.jpg",sep=""))

knitr::include_graphics(File_In)
```
